title: A Wannabe Actor's Ponzi Scheme Examined in 'Bad Actor' Doc Trailer
description: "How could he possibly have done something this outlandish?" Neon has revealed an official trailer for a documentary film called Bad Actor, which plays more like a horror film than an actual documentary about something real. The full title is Bad Actor: A Hollywood Ponzi Scheme - wannabe actor Zachary Horwitz was desperate to make it big as a movie star. The only thing stopping him was talent. Source: YouTube

"How could he possibly have done something this outlandish?" Neon has revealed an official trailer for a documentary film called Bad Actor, which plays more like a horror film than an actual documentary about something real. The full title is Bad Actor: A Hollywood Ponzi Scheme - wannabe actor Zachary Horwitz was desperate to make it big as a movie star. The only thing stopping him was talent. This doc is a juicy true story about deception, denial, fraud, and the seductive promise of fame and fortune. It premiered at the 2024 Tribeca Film Festival and is already on VOD to watch now. "With shocking revelations at every turn, the film questions the fabric of the entertainment business, where a fake it till you make it mentality blurs the lines between reality and facade in the cutthroat pursuit of success. It explores the vulnerability of investors who fell prey to Horwitz's charm and the industry's willingness to ignore red flags." Yep, it sounds like a horror story! People are really the most terrible when it comes to chasing money and fame. The worst.

Here's the main official trailer for Joslyn Jensen's doc Bad Actor, direct from Neon's YouTube:

Intro via Tribeca: "How easy is it to be deceived? In this riveting documentary, the shocking story of D-List action “star” Zachary Horwitz unfolds as his arrest by the FBI in 2021 reveals his so-called movie career was actually facilitating a massive Ponzi scheme – or was it the other way around? Through interviews, victim testimonies, & a wealth of clips from Horwitz's dubious filmography, Bad Actor: A Hollywood Ponzi Scheme delves into the world of this industry hanger-on, exposing the allure of the glitz and glamor that ensnared both Horwitz and his victims." Bad Actor: A Hollywood Ponzi Scheme is directed by American filmmaker Joslyn Jensen, making her feature directorial debut after a few shorts. Produced by Matthew Cherchio, Dan O'Meara, Ted Speaker. This initially premiered at the 2024 Tribeca Film Festival earlier this year. Neon has already released Bad Actor direct-to-VOD on October 8th, 2024 - it's available to view now. Curious?
